entry.title: Dragon Ball Super Super Saiyan Blue Evolved Vegeta Figure - 18cm Anime Statue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type:
Price: 599.00

Showcase the ultimate evolution of the Saiyan Prince with this dynamic 18cm figure of Super Saiyan Blue Evolved Vegeta! This statue captures Vegeta's most refined and powerful form from Dragon Ball Super, with a confident, mid-flight pose that radiates supreme power.
The figure features his iconic blue spiky hair and battle-damaged Saiyan armor, with a torn jumpsuit revealing his muscular form. The sculpted pink and purple flame effects around his body represent the immense power and control of this unique transformation. Mounted on a clear stand, the figure appears to be hovering, ready for a decisive strike.
Key Features:
* Elite Detail: Faithfully recreated to show every aspect of Vegeta's Super Saiyan Blue Evolved form, from the distinct hair to the battle damage on his clothes.
* Compact & Dynamic: At 18cm, it's the perfect size for display, with a mid-air pose that adds a sense of action and energy to your collection.
* Translucent Effects: The sculpted aura effects in a pink-purple hue bring a unique and powerful visual element to the figure.
* High-Quality Build: Made from durable PVC for a long-lasting and detailed finish.
* Collector's Gem: An essential piece for any Dragon Ball Super fan, celebrating Vegeta's ultimate display of pride and strength.
Add the Prince of All Saiyans in his most evolved form to your home. This Super Saiyan Blue Evolved Vegeta figure is a perfect tribute to his character and a fantastic centerpiece for any fan's display.

entry.title: Dragon Ball Z Super Saiyan Vegeta Figure - 30cm Final Flash Statue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type:
Price: 899.00

Unleash the power of the Saiyan Prince with this incredibly detailed 30cm figure of Super Saiyan Vegeta! This dynamic statue captures the intensity and rage of Vegeta at his peak, with a pose that radiates raw power and determination.
The figure showcases Vegeta in his iconic battle-damaged Saiyan armor, with a torn blue jumpsuit revealing his chiseled physique. The sculpted lightning effects around his body and at his feet symbolize the immense energy of his Super Saiyan form, making this a truly electrifying piece. His enraged expression, battle scars, and torn gloves all contribute to an authentic and powerful representation of the character.
Key Features:
* Intense Detail: Meticulously sculpted to show every aspect of Vegeta's battle-worn state, from the rips in his clothes to the scowl on his face.
* Massive Scale: Standing at a substantial 30cm, this figure makes a bold statement and is the perfect centerpiece for any collection.
* Dynamic Effects: Features translucent, sculpted lightning bolts that bring his Super Saiyan power to life, creating a sense of action and energy.
* High-Quality Materials: Made from durable PVC, ensuring a long-lasting and high-quality finish.
* Essential Collector's Piece: A must-have for every Dragon Ball Z fan and collector, celebrating one of the series' most legendary and iconic characters.
Bring the Prince of All Saiyans to your home and display his unyielding pride and power. This Super Saiyan Vegeta figure is a perfect tribute to his character and a fantastic addition to any anime collection.

entry.title: Beerus God of Destruction Figure - Dragon Ball Super Collectible (30CM)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Action Nook
Type: actiion figure
Price: 699.00

Command respect with this imposing 30CM tall Beerus, the God of Destruction, figure from Dragon Ball Super! This highly detailed collectible perfectly captures Beerus in his iconic relaxed yet powerful pose, showcasing his lean, feline physique and distinctive attire.

Every intricate detail is meticulously sculpted, from Beerus's unique head shape and piercing eyes to his gold wristbands, blue and black diamond-patterned clothing, and flowing sash. The dynamic base, depicting a rocky, destroyed landscape, adds to the aura of his destructive power and authority. This premium figure is an absolute must-have for any dedicated Dragon Ball Super fan who appreciates the series' most powerful and charismatic deities.

Crafted from high-quality, durable PVC materials, this Beerus figure is an excellent centerpiece for any display shelf, desk, or anime collection. It embodies the supreme power and aloof nature of a God of Destruction. Ideal for gifting or personal enjoyment, it's a powerful tribute to one of the Dragon Ball universe's most influential characters.

Relive the epic battles of Dragon Ball Super with this powerful 24CM tall Goku Ultra Instinct Omen Battle-Damaged figure! This highly detailed collectible captures Goku in his raw, instinctual form before mastering Ultra Instinct, showcasing his tattered gi, visible battle scars, and surrounded by dynamic pink energy effects.

Every muscle and contour is meticulously sculpted, highlighting Goku's intense determination and raw power. His iconic spiky black hair stands tall, and the translucent pink aura gives the impression of his surging power. Mounted on a clear stand, the figure appears to float in mid-air, ready for the next clash. This premium figure is a must-have for any dedicated Dragon Ball Super fan who cherishes the intense moments of the Tournament of Power.

Crafted from high-quality, durable PVC materials, this Goku Ultra Instinct Omen figure is an excellent addition to any display shelf, desk, or anime collection. It embodies the relentless fighting spirit and unbreakable will of Son Goku. Ideal for gifting or personal enjoyment, it's a powerful tribute to one of anime's greatest heroes.
